aboutDescription: I am a JavaScript developer with over a decade of experience, specializing in creating scalable web applications for both Front-End (React, Redux, TypeScript, Next.js) and Back-End (Express) development. My primary focus is delivering high-quality solutions, and I have successfully led teams across various sectors, always committed to innovation and the latest technological trends.
